title: David Icke - The Perception Deception - MP3 Audiobook
description:
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
David Icke - The Perception Deception - Published in 2013
      Audiobook Encoded by djarmani / 2X in Nov 2014
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

This torrent contains The Perception Deception in it's entirety as a text to speech audiobook.
I selected a male British English voice in an attempt to make it sound a little bit like Icke.
Again, this is NOT an audiobook read by David Icke himself, it is a TTS generated voice.

The total running time for this audiobook is just over 48 hours, perfect for your Icke fix!

I tend to enjoy absorbing my information while multitasking on the go and figured some of you
may also appreciate listening to the information rather than reading it.

Please note, I have also included the original eBook in MOBI & PDF format. There are some
excellent pictures and illustrations, worth checking out for sure!

Best wishes to David Icke, a true champion of exposing suppressed knowledge! :)

Enjoy!

djarmani / 2X
